Experiment Parameters.Stimulus order: Familiarization: label first; Test: voice first
Experiment Parameters.Shape-label interval: Familiarization: 500 ms; Test: 0 ms (voice offset to label onset)
Experiment Parameters.Stimulus presentation duration: Voice: 500-600 ms; Label: 3000 ms (familiarization), until response (test)
Experiment Parameters.Trial Number: Familiarization: 12 trials; Test: 216 trials (72 per block)
